# allAllocations

**Instance Property**

The residency set’s current list of resource allocations.

## Declaration

```swift
var allAllocations: [any MTLAllocation] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is an array of resource allocations, and its elements can be an arbitrary mix of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture], and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap] instances.

The residency set updates the property’s value when you call the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResidencySet/commit()] method.

## Inspecting a residency set

- **label**: An optional name that can help you identify the residency set.
- **device**: The Metal device that owns the residency set.
- **containsAllocation(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the residency set contains a specific resource allocation.
- **allocationCount**: The number of resource allocations in the residency set.
- **allocatedSize**: The amount of resident memory, in bytes, the residency set’s resource allocations consume.
